articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: ChatGPT will now remember — and forget — things you tell it to - TechCrunch
articles.description: OpenAI's ChatGPT chatbot is getting a new feature that allows it to remember and forget specific facts and details.
articles.content:
You’ll soon be able to tell ChatGPT to forget things — or remember specific things in future conversations.
